name: Simplified Style v1
description: Extra-simplified pictograms with minimal detail, optimized for cognitive accessibility and users with intellectual disabilities.
design_principles: Maximum simplicity - reduce to essential elements only
prompt_template: Create an extremely simple pictogram for: '{phrase_spanish}' (English: '{phrase_english}'). Use only basic geometric shapes and bold lines. Reduce to absolute minimum elements needed for recognition. Optimized for users with cognitive disabilities. Output as clean SVG with bold strokes.

prompt_parameters.negative_prompt: complex shapes, details, patterns, textures, gradients, shadows, multiple elements, text, labels

target_audience.secondary: Early learners, users with limited visual processing
accessibility_requirements: Clear for users with learning disabilities

notes: This profile prioritizes cognitive accessibility over aesthetic considerations. Each pictogram should be instantly recognizable with minimal cognitive effort.
